mapper.insert: insert into zh_order_base_info ( info_id, type, belong_depart_id, agreement_id, need_type, need_length, need_start_time, need_arrive_time, order_type, line_attribute, goods_name, goods_weight, goods_volume, need_imported_vehicles, need_own_vehicles, charge_id, unit_price, miles, payment_type, order_advice, customer_bill_no, remark, created_by, created_time, updated_by, updated_time, is_deleted, addr_id, pick_up_time, is_predict )values ( #{infoId}, #{type}, #{belongDepartId}, #{agreementId}, #{needType}, #{needLength}, #{needStartTime}, #{needArriveTime}, #{orderType}, #{lineAttribute}, #{goodsName}, #{goodsWeight}, #{goodsVolume}, #{needImportedVehicles}, #{needOwnVehicles}, #{chargeId}, #{unitPrice}, #{miles}, #{paymentType}, #{orderAdvice}, #{customerBillNo}, #{remark}, #{createdBy}, now(), #{updatedBy}, now(), #{isDeleted}, #{addrId}, #{pickUpTime}, #{isPredict} )
mapper.update: update zh_order_base_info set info_id=#{infoId}, type=#{type}, belong_depart_id=#{belongDepartId}, agreement_id=#{agreementId}, need_type=#{needType}, need_length=#{needLength}, need_start_time=#{needStartTime}, need_arrive_time=#{needArriveTime}, order_type=#{orderType}, line_attribute=#{lineAttribute}, goods_name=#{goodsName}, goods_weight=#{goodsWeight}, goods_volume=#{goodsVolume}, need_imported_vehicles=#{needImportedVehicles}, need_own_vehicles=#{needOwnVehicles}, charge_id=#{chargeId}, unit_price=#{unitPrice}, miles=#{miles}, payment_type=#{paymentType}, order_advice=#{orderAdvice}, customer_bill_no=#{customerBillNo}, remark=#{remark}, updated_by=#{updatedBy}, updated_time=now(), is_deleted=#{isDeleted}, addr_id=#{addrId}, pick_up_time=#{pickUpTime}, is_predict=#{isPredict} where info_id=#{infoId}

update zh_order_base_info
info_id=#{infoId},
type=#{type},
belong_depart_id=#{belongDepartId},
agreement_id=#{agreementId},
need_type=#{needType},
need_length=#{needLength},
need_start_time=#{needStartTime},
need_arrive_time=#{needArriveTime},
order_type=#{orderType},
line_attribute=#{lineAttribute},
goods_name=#{goodsName},
goods_weight=#{goodsWeight},
goods_volume=#{goodsVolume},
need_imported_vehicles=#{needImportedVehicles},
need_own_vehicles=#{needOwnVehicles},
charge_id=#{chargeId},
unit_price=#{unitPrice},
miles=#{miles},
payment_type=#{paymentType},
order_advice=#{orderAdvice},
customer_bill_no=#{customerBillNo},
remark=#{remark},
updated_by=#{updatedBy},
updated_time=now(),
is_deleted=#{isDeleted},
addr_id=#{addrId},
pick_up_time=#{pickUpTime},
is_predict=#{isPredict}
where info_id=#{infoId}
mapper.select: select info_id, type, belong_depart_id, agreement_id, need_type, need_length, need_start_time, need_arrive_time, order_type, line_attribute, goods_name, goods_weight, goods_volume, need_imported_vehicles, need_own_vehicles, charge_id, unit_price, miles, payment_type, order_advice, customer_bill_no, remark, created_by, created_time, updated_by, updated_time, is_deleted, addr_id, pick_up_time, is_predict from zh_order_base_info where info_id=#{infoId} and is_deleted ='00'

select info_id, type, belong_depart_id, agreement_id, need_type, need_length, need_start_time, need_arrive_time, order_type, line_attribute, goods_name, goods_weight, goods_volume, need_imported_vehicles, need_own_vehicles, charge_id, unit_price, miles, payment_type, order_advice, customer_bill_no, remark, created_by, created_time, updated_by, updated_time, is_deleted, addr_id, pick_up_time, is_predict from zh_order_base_info where info_id=#{infoId}
